sentences.sContent: From all of us in sales: Merry Christmas!
sentences.sContent_eng: From all of us in sales: Merry Christmas!
sentences.sCn: 我们销售部全体人员祝您圣诞快乐!

sentences.sContent: Merry Christmas from all of your students.
sentences.sCn: 祝您圣诞快乐，您的全体学生敬上。

sentences.sContent: Holding back the tears I hollered "Merry Christmas Mother!!
sentences.sContent_eng: Holding back the tears I hollered "Merry Christmas Mother!!
sentences.sCn: 我忍住了眼泪，喊道，“妈妈，圣诞快乐！
